import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import HomeHead from '../components/HomeHead' import _ from '../assets/utils' import './Home.less' import { Swiper } from 'antd-mobile' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import api from '../api' const Detail=function(){ // 创建所需状态 let [today,setToday]=useState(_.formatTime(null,"{0}{1}{2}")), [bannerData,setBannerData]=useState(); // 第一次渲染 useEffect(()=>{ (async ()=>{ try{ let {data,stories,top_stories}=await api.queryNewsLatest() setToday(data) setBannerData(top_stories) }catch(_){ } })() },[]) return
{ bannerData.length>0?
